title: Sion in distress, or, The groans of the Protestant Chruch [sic]
author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
publisher: Printed by George Larkin for Enoch Prosser,
notes: Attributed by Wing, NUC pre-1956 imprints to Benjamin Keach.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
